name: dammit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of anger : He banged his fist on the desk angrily. "Dammit!" Just let me speak, damnit!
used for emphasis: But dammit, I don't care. Damnit I'm glad to be here. See also
damnSynonym
goddammit
More examplesFewer examplesDammit, how much longer was this going to continue?"Damnit," I said. "Why can't I ask?"
